ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), OR($Profile.Name = "2008-09 HRS 4S Operations",$Profile.Name = "2008-09 HRS 4S Operations B",$Profile.Name ="2008-09 HRS 4S Service Manager"),
IF(RecordType.Name = "HRS 4S Manual Trade",
IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Transaction_Code__c,'Correction'),ISPICKVAL(Transaction_Code__c,'Reversal')), ISBLANK(Previous_Distribution_Trade_Date__c),false),False))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Correction or Reversal, the Previous Distribution Trade Date is required.
